website_summaries.verdict: A trusted study guide that has been a reliable supplement to other property and casualty books for years, but if you are concerned about the date of publish, check out others on our list.
pros: Comes with a CD with sample testing and provides detailed concepts throughout
Written by a trio of authors with decades of experience in finance and insurance
cons: Studying specific state-by-state information will require additional materials
More dated than other study guides, but much of the information is timeless

customer_reviews.title: ****** BUYER BEWARE!!! *******
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS BOOK! Bisys was bought by Kaplan in 2005 and they do not support the CD and will not ACCEPT to any responsibility (even though I'm sure that they are receiving part of the proceeds). They will direct you to their site to buy their updated material (which is much more expensive, of course). I wish I had learned this earlier so I could have returned this to Amazon. TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY -- AND THE MATERIAL IS TOO OUTDATED. AMAZON - REMOVE THIS FROM YOUR WEBSITE PLEASE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BMore Lady

customer_reviews.title: Passed on the first try!
customer_reviews.text: The CD in the book allowed me to take practice test after practice test. I felt very comfortable in taking my insurance exam as a result. I passed with a high 80's score on my first attempt.
customer_reviews.author: Biff Majestic

customer_reviews.title: not as useful as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: There is certainly a lot of information in the book. The CD...not as useful as I had hoped. First, I had to find a way to make the practice tests work. Second, you are limited to three, unless you buy greater access...but the website given in the book is no longer valid. I cannot honestly recommend this very much.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Read book, passed test
customer_reviews.text: Read the book fully, took the two practice tests, and passed the test on the first try. Three weeks of boring reading, but the book was great. Worst part was memorizing those homeowners forms. I didn't try to use the CD that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super informative book on insurance
customer_reviews.text: Super informative book on insurance. However, it is a massive amount of information that will take months and months to get through and learn. I ended up having to take an online class for the test instead because of how difficult it was to understand and remember all the info given in this book.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I was very prepared because of studying this book.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to prepare for my exam. I self studied with this book only. I passed with an A on the Texas PNC exam (on my first attempt). I feel like I was very prepared because of studying this book. Great investment in my future.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E.

customer_reviews.title: Too old to be pertinent to today's laws, policies, and terminology
customer_reviews.text: This is a 2005 edition. WAY too old to have correct terminology and information about 2019 policies. It really did not do my any good at all and, in fact, confused me when I was trying to reconcile today's terminology that I had already learned in my current classes to the information in the book. Returned it and wasted 2 days in prep with this book.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I really like this book. I haven’t read the entire books but so far, very easy to read and understand.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Torres

customer_reviews.title: Insurance
customer_reviews.text: Had loads of information that was on the test very good to help study!
customer_reviews.author: Berenice

customer_reviews.title: Packaged good and delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: Packaged good and delivered on time. The book is easy to understand and good job explaining everything in simple terms.
customer_reviews.author: DeBora K.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helped a lot with the prep for the test ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helped a lot with the prep for the test. I passed, but you do still have to take the classes is you are getting this license for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: sexynita

customer_reviews.title: while the text book was amazing (and it truly was) - informative
customer_reviews.text: while the text book was amazing (and it truly was) - informative, clear concise, thorough, easily navigable between topics and sub sections, etc.. The CD enclosed with the book did not work. As a result I wasn't able to open any of the practice exams or course content, even after trying on multiple computers. For me, the interactive CD was one of the big selling points and the foremost reason I bought this textbook.
customer_reviews.author: Annie p

customer_reviews.title: Property and Casualty Book
customer_reviews.text: This book will help successfully pass the state exam for an agents license. The individual state information, which is not included in this manual, is essential though and anyone using this book should supplement with information from the individual state on their license.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Written Guide
customer_reviews.text: The book is divided into 23 small chapters. Each chapter has an exam section. It is written in a way that reader can enjoy. Note, Alert, Tip sections are very helpful. I can't wait to try out the cd which would be on my agenda after going through all the chapters. Only draw back of the cd is you can only take the test 3 times. But the value of the book is suffice the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Loads of great info. If you're disciplined to self-study
customer_reviews.text: Loads of great info. If you're disciplined to self-study, this book will save you plenty of money as you're not paying hundreds of dollars in taking an instructored course.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: It’ll help you pass the P&C exam.
customer_reviews.text: Great study aid but it’s the 2009 edition. Luckily the P&C exams don’t change much. It’ll help you through them. You should buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: insurance book
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I purchased this book. It helped me pass the exam.
customer_reviews.author: lisa m

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought another course on Property and Causality Insurance that advertised it was a fully comprehensive course. The cost was six times the Exam Cram Book. Exam Cram is far superior to the other course. It is better written more logical and a great value. I haven't had the opportunity to take the test yet but I feel very comfortable with the lexicon and concepts that I have learned from this very fine book. Sincerely, Lance Morton
customer_reviews.author: Lance Morton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It helped me pass my test after failing exam twice. Made a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Dulce

customer_reviews.title: Not much of a cram?? Way too detailed ...
customer_reviews.text: Not much of a cram?? Way too detailed and lengthy as a cram book?? ... It is complete and writing is smaller than the typical text book. Probably should have gone with the dummies book. See what happens?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check your versions.....
customer_reviews.text: Outdated and no access to the database that has replaced the CD's that come with the book. Make sure you have the most recent version.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: I passed
customer_reviews.text: The book is as good only if one reads them. :)
customer_reviews.author: JEN HUANG

customer_reviews.title: Good general reference
customer_reviews.text: Worked well in general for overall knowledge. You'll need to know state specific information to score well on your exam
customer_reviews.author: S. Refkin

customer_reviews.title: CD did not come with book which was the main thing I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: They scammed me and it said it had a CD included. And when I opened the package I looked for the CD but there was not a CD.
customer_reviews.author: HUSSAIN

customer_reviews.title: cd wont load and cant get state info online????
customer_reviews.text: The book itself is ok but you cant use the cd or log into the web to get the state info needed to study...... they need to really say that so you can make a better choice.......... anyone else have a way to download the state info ?????
customer_reviews.author: tom coriell

customer_reviews.title: def recommend this book!
customer_reviews.text: i definitely recommend this book. alot cheaper then other stores /sellers , very great studying material
customer_reviews.author: Marisela navarro

customer_reviews.title: Took the 90 hr state class. This book should ...
customer_reviews.text: Took the 90 hr state class. This book should have bee read at the same time help me pass exam second time out.

customer_reviews.title: Product not fully given
customer_reviews.text: The CD was supposed to come with the book, however, it has been ripped out. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Lots of info
customer_reviews.text: I have only gotten through a couple of chapters, but there is a ton of info and the questions help you in understanding the material. Great book to use.
customer_reviews.author: Finally

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for studying!
customer_reviews.text: Based on not being an online reader for studying. This book definitely had what I was looking for when it came to getting an "A" on the exam!

customer_reviews.title: Great book.
customer_reviews.text: Passed exam on first try by reading this book. Although my CD did not work
customer_reviews.author: Evis Everhart

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: This really helped me pass the state exam. It is very detailed and explains to you in ways that makes it easy to understand. Very good book. If you are having trouble passing the state exam, check it out!
customer_reviews.author: themanofsteel_87

customer_reviews.title: This book is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This book made a huge difference for me when it came time to take my exam. I passed with 97% thanks to this book and good nights sleep
customer_reviews.author: SHREK the friendly consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great study guide and book
customer_reviews.text: Great study guide and book. 3 stars only because it's not up to date. This company was bought by Kaplan, and is the basis of their program. Don't get me wrong, Kaplan is what I use and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Meals

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had read this before taking the AZ test!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Study Tool
customer_reviews.text: Great book so far. Let's see if I can pass my exam the first time!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Good prep book.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book after completing the A.D. Banker online course. The book is much more beginner friendly and better organized than the online course, and at a fraction of the price (wish I had read it first). The only drawback is the CD did not work in my Mac, and there is no state specific information. Passed the exam on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Boring
customer_reviews.text: Having been a licensed agent I am not so sure that all this info is correct. Wish I hadn't let my license lapse - then I wouildn't be in this position
customer_reviews.author: Savy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time. The book was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Theophrastus

customer_reviews.title: Great study guide!
customer_reviews.text: Great book with a lot of information! I love the layout of the chapters and it really helps me stayed focused.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Help
customer_reviews.text: I used all the study guides for a week and passed both the property and casualty section of the insurance exam. This book had great examples of situations in every day life. It was easy to understand and read. I highly recommend this book to anyone who needs help studying for the P&C exam.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what i needed to help me pass my P&C course. Studied it only and passed.
customer_reviews.author: codeloc03

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this book when it's time for me to get licensed and certified in Property & Casualty I will be prepared!!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Surry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good price, good product. specialty like the way AMAZON take care of customers.
customer_reviews.author: Manh Ho

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great book, I think I will pass the exam. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: All you need to pass your test
customer_reviews.text: Helped me pass my property exam with no extra class or study material just extra online practice exams
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Hagar

customer_reviews.title: Used for property/casualty exam
customer_reviews.text: Very well written. The book takes the major concepts & explains them so that they are understandable - very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: K. Edson

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, but not very specific
customer_reviews.text: This should not be your only study choice. It is a general guide, state laws are not taken into account.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Westermann

customer_reviews.title: Good enough!
customer_reviews.text: This book was purchased some time ago for an ex girlfriend of mine. She wanted to get her license and this was all it took. After studying the book for a few weeks she passed with no trouble. I have to say it was good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Pete N.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not all states included
customer_reviews.text: The book is very helpful after wasting 40 hours in a class by a doddering old man with outdated material. However, was extremely disappointed to find out my state - GA - isn't one of the states included in the practice exams on CD. Neither is Calif., Fla., Okla. or Wisc. - so be forewarned. Also don't see info on the HO 2000, which my other exam CD has several questions about.
customer_reviews.author: Read-n-write

customer_reviews.title: GREAT RESOURCE!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have passed my P&C exam without this book! I was taking the online class and it just wasn't making sense. This well-organized book explained things in a way that was clear and easy to understand. Great book! I passed on the first try. I will continue to use it as a reference manual.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaNow

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: too long as a cram text. should have been more specific. did not include state specific law topics...this is of utmost importance. what is a bicycle without a wheel?
customer_reviews.author: besham

customer_reviews.title: awesome book to pass the test
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy way everything is explained in this book that you need to PASS the exam. If you read this book thoroughly, take the practice exams after each chapter you will definitely pass the test.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I could not have passed my exam without it! Strongly suggest using this in addtion to the exam prep course of your choice!
customer_reviews.author: April Barton

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best book out there if you are considering going for your state insurance license. Excellent format and easy read.
customer_reviews.author: TomTrace

customer_reviews.title: Quality was as stated
customer_reviews.text: Great for price and in good shape for a used book.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Missing CD
customer_reviews.text: The book was in good condition, though there was no mention of the missing CD.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Otto

customer_reviews.title: Helped studying for exam
customer_reviews.text: Helped studying for exam - I failed my first attempt but with studying this book on top of the material I had already been given I was able to pass the test the second time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy H.

customer_reviews.title: property and casualty insurance Exam cram
customer_reviews.text: The book was in good condition.Got it within a short time.Would recommend others to buy from them .Even the CD inside was okay.Thank you
customer_reviews.author: kiama

customer_reviews.title: book was not very helpful
customer_reviews.text: This book will not really help you if you are trying to pass a state test. May help if you are just trying to acquire general knowledge of insurance.
customer_reviews.author: blueskies

customer_reviews.title: CD HAS UNREPORTED LIMITED USE &
customer_reviews.text: BESIDES THE COMPANY BEING CHEAP AND LIMITING HOW MANY TIMES YOU CAN TAKE THE TEST (FLASH CARD INGESTING) YOU ARE NOT INFORMED OF THIS, TILL YOU OPEN AND USE THE CD. IMPORTANT CHAPTERS ON HOME OWNERS AND DWELLING ARE ILLOGICAL, CLUTTERED AND CONFUSING..AS ARE A FEW OTHERS. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS SOURCE FOR CONVIENCE IN LEARNING HAVING BOUGHT 2 OF THE COMPANIES BOOKS...BUT YES, IT IS CHEAPLY PRICED....VALUE???

customer_reviews.title: Great book

customer_reviews.title: Property and Casualty Insurance License Exam Cram
customer_reviews.text: I have not started this book yet however I used a previous version to assist me in passing my Life exam and I am now working on my Health exam. I ordered the Property and Casualty because I did not want to miss out on a great opportunity. Thanks.

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The book contained great information; however, the cd was a huge disappointment because it only allows you to take the test three times.

customer_reviews.title: Simple you now this book you pass state exam

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The book is well organized and has a ton of content. Chapter summary exams are useful, the tear out cram sheet is great, and the practice exam was very helpful. I'd recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Cook

customer_reviews.title: but good read i
customer_reviews.text: i spank to this book on the reg... all the pages are stuck together.. i will need another soon.... not enough pics... but good read i guess

customer_reviews.title: I pass the test
customer_reviews.text: It helped me to be able to get information I did not have from my class that was on the test. I did pass the test and I am license to sell insurance.
customer_reviews.author: Tresa

customer_reviews.title: Covered all of the relevant sectors in a concise manner ...
customer_reviews.text: Covered all of the relevant sectors in a concise manner. Subject material was well organized. The disc was helpful with respect to practice eams and the unit tests. FYI, the test is worded much differently than the practice exams on the disc....but material is the same.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D.

customer_reviews.title: Makes testing easy
customer_reviews.text: Great rent,got my husband is insurance license here in texas
